name: metalogger
description: Node.js logging for grown-ups: a versatile logging wrapper that leaves you the choice, but removes the pain. Inspired by Apache Commons Logging

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/ test/acceptance/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/ test/acceptance/
